body:
Hi all Im Darlek_222 as you can see but my real name is Reece, you can use it if you would like.

A brief history of me and how I got here,My gaming experience started on xbox with Call of Duty Black ops, I got it when it came out about 4 years ago, I meet my first internet friend on xbox who amazingly I still play with today as he made the switch to pc with me.

 I started playing minecraft about 3 years ago, I mainly started by just hoping servers with my irl friends,and my friend from xbox. Eventually coming across my first server which I stayed with for a while, this was Minez I think I played for a couple of months maybe 4 but it got boring so I looked to move on, so I hoped servers again for a while.

Then I found ocn with some friends I had made on minez and my friend from xbox we played this as are main server. I have been playing for about 1 and a half years now. I have meet some really great people and I still enjoy it strangely.

Currently I like playing OCN, HCF and now avicus a bit too.
